articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Flight Drill for Inspection of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Flight Drill for Inspection of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, guided a flight drill for inspection of airmen of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force. 
					 Units 1017, 447 and 458 of the KPA Air and Anti-Force took part in the drill. 
					
					 The drill involved taking-off and landing on the highway-airfield, flight for intercepting targets in the air and demonstration of special aerobatics. 
					
					 The airmen fully showed the Supreme Commander their high art of aviation they have cultivated in their day-to-day training. 
					
					 He said that he feels whenever watching flight drills that our airmen are very good at flying and all of the reliable combat airmen defending the sky of the country are his very dear comrades-in-arms trained by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il with their loving care and phoenixes, the strongest in idea and faith. 
					
					 Then he personally boarded the seat of pursuit plane No. 550 involved in the drill and learned in detail about the engineering data of the plane and had a talk with its pilot who is company commander.
					
					 Repeatedly expressing satisfaction over the successful drill, he gave thanks of the supreme commander of the KPA to KPA Air and Anti-Air Force Unit 1017, Unit 447 and Unit 458 and awarded higher military ranks to Kim Hyon Ung, Kang Kyong Chol, Kim Chang Ho and Sin Thae Sop, commanders of the flying corps, for displaying high art of aviation by his order.
					
					 He discussed various measures for coping with the modern war with the commanding officers of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force and indicated ways for settling important issues arising in rounding off the combat preparations of the air and anti-air force and fresh tasks.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, O Il Jong and Han Kwang Sang, department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Publishes New Work
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Publishes New Work
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un on Oct. 24 published his work "To Protect National Heritage Is a Patriotic Undertaking for Adding Brilliance to the History and Traditions of Our Nation".
					 Kim Jong Un said in his work that the reconstruction of Mausoleum of King Tangun as a magnificent edifice thanks to noble patriotism and wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il helped clearly prove that the Koreans have lived as a homogeneous nation in one and the same land with King Tangun as the founding-father since the dawn of human civilization and led to the appearance of a holy place of the nation for educating all Koreans in patriotism.
					
					 This is a great auspicious event of the Korean nation and a shining victory of the Juche-oriented policy for protecting national heritage, he noted, adding: 
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il attached importance to the work for protecting national heritage and channeled their efforts into it in the whole period of their revolutionary leadership, thus glorifying before the world the time-honored history and brilliant culture of the Korean nation.
					
					 Kim Il Sung set right every historical issue which the big-power chauvinists and sycophants distorted and made complicated, thereby proving that Korea is one of the cradles of human civilization and correctly formulating the history of the Korean nation which has been created in the law-governed process of historical development since Korea was founded by King Tangun.
					
					 Kim Il Sung set forth the policy of carrying forward and developing the national heritage from the Juche-based standpoint and led the work to unearth and ascertain lots of cultural heritage kept buried into oblivion and restore the historic sites vandalized by foreign invaders to their former glory, thus handing the cultural legacies created by ancestors to the people and their children as national treasures. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il properly estimated and clarified the issues of great significance in correcting the history of the Korean nation true to the intention of Kim Il Sung, adding shine to the just history of the nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Un stressed in his work that it is the firm will of the Workers' Party of Korea to glorify the country as an advanced highly civilized state in the world and a prosperous and strong nation with the time-honored history and brilliant culture true to the noble intention of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He clarified in his work that the work to protect the national heritage is a patriotic work for carrying forward and developing the priceless spiritual and material legacies left by the ancestors and preserving and adding luster to the history and traditions of the nation.
					
					 He underscored the need to hold fast to the ideas and theories on protecting national heritage enunciated by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as guidelines and fully embody them.
					
					 Noting that the principles of Juche character, historicism and scientific accuracy are the fundamental principles to be consistently maintained to protect, carry forward and develop the national cultural heritage, Kim Jong Un indicated tasks to be fulfilled.
					
					 Kim Jong Un went on: 
					
					 Historical remains and relics should be restored to their former state to suit the specific features of the relevant societies and historical periods and preserved and managed so that they may retain their former glory.
					
					 It is necessary to value priceless creations and beautiful manners and customs associated with the wisdom and skills of the nation and handed down generation after generation and carry forward and develop them as required by the times.
					
					 It is also necessary to conduct well the work for protecting and managing scenic spots and natural monuments.
					
					 Even a single tree, a single blade of grass and a single stone adding to the beautiful landscape of scenic spots should be valued and birds or mountain animals in the zones of the scenic spots should be firmly protected.
					
					 It is necessary to successfully build up history museums and other centers for education in history as required by the people's culture and emotion and the trend of the era and intensify the education through them.
					
					 The work for protecting the national heritage should be conducted as the work involving the whole state and all people and put on a scientific basis as required by the developing reality.
					
					 Kim Jong Un underlined the need to introduce and appreciate our people and overseas compatriots' patriotic deed of presenting valuable historical relics to the country.
					
					 He called for conducting exchange with international organizations and other countries.
					
					 He underscored the need to uphold and preserve the immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and add brilliance to the history and tradition of the Korean nation by thoroughly implementing the party's policy for protecting national heritage.

articles.title: Hostile Forces Hit for Their Moves to Adopt Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution"
articles.content:
Hostile Forces Hit for Their Moves to Adopt Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution"
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The hostile forces' moves to have an anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" adopted have reached a graver phase this year, timed to coincide with the U.S. start of all-out confrontation with the DPRK.
					 A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry issued a statement Thursday in this regard.
					
					 The DPRK has made earnest and sincere efforts to promote international dialogue and cooperation in the field of human rights for the purpose of steadily promoting the popular masses' enjoyment of human rights, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 In the recent days the DPRK took a magnanimous stand to positively take into consideration the issue of conducting human rights dialogue which had been frozen due to the unilateral action  of the EU and the issue of the visit of the UN special rapporteur on human rights issue in the DPRK to it for the purpose of promoting genuine human rights on the principle of respect for sovereignty, agreed with the matter of the visit of the EU representative with full mandate over human rights to the DPRK and expressed an intention to accept technical cooperation with the Office of the UN High Commissioner for Human Rights.
					
					 Nevertheless, international dialogue and cooperation have not been effected in the field of human rights. This is attributable to the U.S. hostile policy to tarnish the image of the DPRK and bring down its social system at any cost by persistently hyping its "human rights issue".
					
					 It was none other than the U.S. which let its Secretary of State convene a "high-level meeting on human rights in north Korea" and barred the DPRK, the party concerned, from participating in it for fear of the disclosure of the sinister backstage political confab. It was again the U.S. which prodded into an anti-north smear campaign such human scum as "those defectors from the north" who fled to the south from their old homes and kinsmen after committing thrice-cursed crimes. 
					
					 Afraid of the possible dialogue and cooperation between the DPRK and the international community in the field of human rights and, accordingly, the further promotion of its people's enjoyment of human rights and the rising international prestige of the DPRK, the U.S. is making desperate efforts to maintain an international atmosphere of pressure on the DPRK, turning its face away from the latter's sincere efforts and raising unreasonable demands.
					
					 If the EU adopts an  anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" harsher than the previous one, dancing to the U.S. tune, an opportunity of engaging the DPRK over the human rights issue will be missed for good and this will entail unpredictable consequences.
					
					 The DPRK will make every possible effort to defend and consolidate the Korean-style socialist system based on the popular masses-first spirit.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Hits S. Korean Authorities for Extending Transfer of OPECON
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Hits S. Korean Authorities for Delayed Transfer of OPECON
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean puppet authorities, at the recent 46th annual security consultative meeting in Washington, agreed to put off the transfer of OPECON (wartime operation control), which had been scheduled by 2015, until security circumstances in around the Korean Peninsula and core military capabilities of the south Korean forces are provided.
					 They also decided to keep the U.S.-south Korea Combined Forces Command and the U.S. 210th Fire Brigade, which had been planned to transfer to Phyongthaek, Kyonggi Province of south Korea, in Seoul and the area north of the River Han still before the OPECON transfer and continue their consultation on the proposed U.S.-Japan-south Korea sharing of military information.
					
					 In this regard, the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea released information bulletin No. 1077 on Wednesday.
					
					 Lurking behind such bargaining are the sinister intention of the south Korean puppet group to maintain their life through closer military tie-up with the U.S. and intensify the war and confrontation moves against the DPRK and the U.S. criminal intention to realize its policy of aggression on the DPRK and the strategy for domination over the Asia-Pacific with south Korea as a military bridgehead, the bulletin said, and went on:
					
					 The south Korean puppet group's conspiracy with their American master for indefinite delay of the OPECON transfer is sparking off the surging wrath of all the countrymen as it is an intolerable disgrace of the nation and an unpardonable heinous treachery. 
					
					 Permanent abandonment of military sovereignty is little different from permanent abandonment of political and economic sovereignty.  The south Korean people can not evade the disgrace as stateless people, subjugated to the U.S. in politics, economy and military aspects, for good.
					
					 The world knows no such traitors as the south Korean puppet authorities who have abandoned their military sovereignty as a whole to outside forces.
					
					 Those who agreed to indefinitely put off the transfer of OPECON will be condemned down through generations as second Ri Wan Yong and second Syngman-Rhee traitors.
					
					 It is ridiculous that the south Korean puppet authorities would talk about "advanced state" though they are war servants deprived of military sovereignty, essence of national rights, by outside forces. 
					
					 We, together with all other Koreans, will never allow the postponing of OPECON transfer for aggression but take decisive counter-measures.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Arrives in Kampala
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Arrives in Kampala
Kampala, October 29 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, arrived in Kampala on Wednesday to pay an official goodwill visit to the Republic of Uganda.
					 Also arriving together with him were Kang Ha Guk, minister of Public Health, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, So Kil Bok, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, and other suite members.
					
					 Earlier, they left the Republic of Congo.

articles.title: Congratulations to Chairman of Sudanese National Congress
articles.content:
Congratulations to Chairman of Sudanese National Congress
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Omar Hassan Ahmad Al-Bashir in connection with the fact that the 4th Congress of the Sudanese National Congress was successfully held and he was reelected chairman of the Congress there.
					 The WPK in the message said that his reelection was an indication of deep trust and expectation of the leadership and all members of the Sudanese National Congress for him.
					
					 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would grow stronger in the joint struggle for independence against imperialism, it wished him bigger success in his responsible work for strengthening the party and achieving the country's stability and development.

articles.title: Japanese Government Delegation Flies back
articles.content:
Japanese Government Delegation Flies back
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government delegation led by Junichi Ihara, chief of the Asia and Oceania Bureau of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, flew back home Thursday.
					 During its sojourn in the DPRK, Chairman of the "Special Investigation Committee" So Tae Ha, counselor for security of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK who is concurrently vice-minister of State Security, briefed the Japanese side of the investigation into all Japanese in the DPRK which had been conducted so far for the implementation of an agreement reached between the governments of the DPRK and Japan in Stockholm.
					
					 The chiefs of panels of the "committee" had relevant working-level interviews with thee Japanese side.

articles.title: Renovated Railway Stations Open to Traffic
articles.content:
Renovated Railway Stations Open to Traffic
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Projects of renovating Ryongwon-ri and Paesanjom railway stations have been completed.
					 The modern stations in perfect harmony with surroundings of the Yonphung Scientists Rest Home and Wisong Scientists Residential Quarters will be used by holiday-makers at the Rest Home and other people.
					
					 Completion ceremonies took place at the stations on Thursday.
					
					 Present there were officials in the field of railway transport, builders and employees.

articles.title: Kanggye Winery Renovated
articles.content:
Kanggye Winery Renovated
Kanggye, October 30 (KCNA) -- The Kanggye Winery in Jagang Province of the DPRK has been renovated.
					 An integrated production system was established and rooms for research, product samples and sci-tech dissemination took their shapes at the winery.
					
					 The renovation makes it possible to triple the production capacity and remarkably raise the quality of products.

articles.title: New Grass Seeder Proves Effective
articles.content:
New Grass Seeder Proves Effective
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The Institute of Agricultural Mechanization under the Academy of Agricultural Science in the DPRK has recently developed a new grass seeder.
					 The seeder, peculiar in its structure, makes it possible to evenly sow grass seed. And it should be coupled to tractor, when sowing.
					
					 It has proved effective in reclaiming the Sepho Plateau.

articles.title: Rabbit Show and Seminar on Experience Held
articles.content:
Rabbit Show and Seminar on Experience Held
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- A rabbit show and seminar on experience of organizations of the youth league and the children's union at schools and schoolchildren across the country took place at Anhak Senior Secondary School in Taesong District, Pyongyang on Thursday.
					 On display there are new species of rabbits which schoolchildren from various areas bred through their extramural activities and rabbits of diverse species suited to the climatic and soil conditions of Korea.
					
					 Present there were officials of the youth league, schoolchildren and instructors of the youth league and the children's union of the schools which set a good example in breeding rabbits.

articles.title: Far-Infrared Lightweight Insulating Bricks in Effective Use
articles.content:
Far-Infrared Lightweight Insulating Bricks in Effective Use
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Far-infrared lightweight insulating bricks have been applied to various industrial establishments like the Rakwon Machine Complex and Sinuiju Spinning Machine Plant in DPRK, proving effective.
					 The brick is made with a new fireproof material and remarkably higher than chamotte brick in the amount of thermal radiation, while its coefficient of thermal conduction reaching one third of the latter.
					
					 Experts say its application to all industrial furnaces across the country will lead to economizing in tens of thousands kilowatts of electric power.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on S. Korean Authorities' Double-dealing Act
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on S. Korean Authorities' Double-dealing Act
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities would clamor about "dual character" and "double-dealing tactics", whenever provoking the DPRK over the matters related to the inter-Korean relations.
					 It is just like the guilty party filing the suit first.
					
					 This is well evidenced by their attitude toward the issue of anti-DPRK leaflet scattering, a stumbling block in the way of improving the north-south relations.
					
					 The authorities of south Korea have so far asserted that there is no legal ground and regulation to restrict the leaflet scattering.
					
					 Such stance was taken again when an anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operation by human scum, slated in the area around Rimjin Pavilion of south Korea on Oct. 25, was frustrated by local inhabitants and members of progressive organizations. 
					
					 The puppet minister of Unification in an appearance on Oct. 26 contented that "there is no legal ground and regulation to restrict NGOs' autonomous anti-north leaflet scattering as freedom of expression is to be respected under the constitution." And he added the "government" remains unchanged in such basic stand.
					
					 If then, why did the "government" recently block, under the pretext of no-fly zone, a civic organization in Kwanghwamun, Seoul, from attempting to send a balloon of leaflets carrying the population's demand for probe into the truth about the sunken ferry Sewol to Chongwadae? Is there any limitation to the application of laws equal to everyone?
					
					 It is a height of shamelessness to put down the demand of justice and shield the criminals' action.
					
					 What the south Korean authorities seek in backing such human scum's anti-DPRK leaflet scattering is just to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK in a foolish attempt to realize their design for "unification by absorption".
					
					 Untold are the catastrophic results anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operations have brought to the north-south relations so far. Nevertheless, the south Korean authorities still take double-dealing attitude, talking about "basic stand of the government".
					
					 The authorities of south Korea had better behave themselves, mindful that if they refuse to totally halt such provocations as anti-DPRK leaflet scattering, the north-south relations will be driven into an uncontrollable phase and they will be held entirely accountable for it.

articles.title: U.S. Should Halt Human Rights Abuses at Home: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Should Halt Human Rights Abuses at Home: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Young black man Myers was mercilessly killed by at least ten bullets fired by a white policeman in St. Louis, Missouri State of the U.S. on Oct. 8.
					 Some days ago another young black man was shot to death by a white policeman in Ferguson City of the same state. The police ruthlessly suppressed the protestors against the police crackdown, leveling guns and using tear gas and smoke shells.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes in a commentary in this regard: This clearly proves that the U.S. is the worst human rights abuser as its people are subject to maltreatment and contempt owing to their different race and always seized with fear of when they will be shot to death.
					
					 What is ridiculous is that the U.S. is apt to kick off a "human rights" racket against other countries in the international arena and put pressure upon them by politicizing "human rights issue," building public opinion on it and internationalizing it.
					
					 The U.S. is behaving recklessly in the international arena recently, persistently hyping the DPRK's non-existent "human rights" issue. 
					
					 It is the height of daydream for the U.S. to stifle the DPRK through a "human rights" offensive.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to put under control the human rights abuses at home, to begin with, before sustaining a bitter setback in its operations to interfere in internal affairs of other countries under the pretext of non-existent "human rights" issues.
					
					 Doing so would be the only way for the U.S. to save its face in the international arena.

articles.title: S. Korean Broadcasting Deplores Authorities' Renunciation of OPECON
articles.content:
S. Korean Broadcasting Deplores Authorities' Renunciation of OPECON
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean CBS reported on Oct. 25 that only the U.S. interest was met by the south Korean authorities' renunciation of the right to the wartime operation control (OPECON).
					 There was a criticism that south Korea accepted most of the military and economic terms requested by the U.S. in return for agreeing on the postponement of the OPECON, the broadcasting service aired, and went on:
					
					 The postponement of the OPECON was what was also sought by the U.S. However, south Korea proposed it first, making the U.S. have the upper hand in the negotiations and gain economic profits as well.
					
					 It has thus become difficult for the "president" to evade the argument on her failure to fulfill her election commitment.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive Slammed for Shunning Bereaved Families of Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive Slammed for Shunning Bereaved Families of Ferry Sewol Disaster
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea, said that bereaved families of the ferry Sewol disaster condemned the puppet chief executive for turning her face away from them on October 29.
					 They have waged an action in demand of the probe into the truth about the disaster and the institution of a special law. They had a vigil outside the building of the "National Assembly" in order to meet with the chief executive.
					
					 But that morning the chief executive went straight into the NA building without even glancing at the bereaved families.
					
					 Huge police formed double and treble layers to block the bereaved families.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Bulgaria
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- A Bulgarian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Sofia on Oct. 21.
					 Dinko Zhelev, head of the Organizational Department of the National Council of the Bulgarian Socialist Party, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il and significantly organize political and cultural events including a meeting, seminar and photo exhibition on the occasion of the third anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Bangladeshi Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Bangladeshi Political Figure
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League and chairman of the Bangladesh Self-Reliance Research Centre, issued a statement on Oct. 24 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 He said:
					
					 We are recollecting with deep emotion the immortal exploits HE Kim Jong Il performed for the era and humankind and his brilliant revolutionary life on the occasion of the third anniversary of his demise.
					
					 Kim Jong Il performed undying feats on behalf of the era and history by leading the revolution and construction to victory for a long period with his gifted wisdom, outstanding idea, theories and extraordinary leadership ability.
					
					 He systematized the Juche idea, the great guiding idea in the era of independence, for the progressive mankind.
					
					 We are sure that the Korean people will register bigger successes in the struggle for reunifying the country and building a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by British Organization
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is a Juche-Type Revolutionary Party Which Inherited the Glorious Tradition of the 'DIU'" was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on Oct. 16.
					 The work published on Oct. 17, Juche 71 (1982) clarifies that the WPK is the revolutionary party that paved a fresh road of its development and the Juche-type revolutionary party which conducts activities independently and creatively, guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 It deals with the position and role of the party in accomplishing the socialist cause.

articles.title: U.S. Ambition to Stifle DPRK Can Not Be Realized: Russian Political Figure
articles.content:
U.S. Ambition to Stifle DPRK Can Not Be Realized: Russian Political Figure
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Sazhi Umalatova, chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, posted an article accusing the U.S. "human rights" racket against the DPRK on its website on Oct. 20.
					 She noted that the U.S. has long used the conception of "human rights", "freedom" and "democracy" as the means for invading and plundering other countries.
					
					 She said:
					
					 "Human rights", "freedom" and "democracy" touted by the U.S. are aimed at justifying aggression and plunder.
					
					 Human rights are being violated wherever the U.S. goes.
					
					 However, the U.S. is finding fault with the DPRK over its genuine human rights.
					
					 What the U.S. is seeking is to kick off "human rights" racket in a bid to bring down the socialist system of the DPRK.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un has devoted himself to the people, true to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il's noble intention of believing in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 The DPRK is firmly defending socialism and building edifices for the happiness of the people under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The DPRK is a powerful nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear weapons are the strong means for arresting the U.S. invasion.
					
					 Gone are days never to return when the U.S. could threaten the DPRK with nukes.
					
					 The U.S. ambition of stifling the DPRK can not be realized.

articles.title: Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported by French Organization
articles.content:
Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported by French Organization
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The France-Korea Friendship Association posted an article supporting the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK) on its website on Oct. 23.
					 President Kim Il Sung laid down the proposal for founding the DFRK at the 6th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea in October, 1980, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The proposal is the most realistic way for reunifying Korea.
					
					 It reflects the desire of the whole Korean nation for peace and reunification.
					
					 The DPRK has consistently called for the reunification through the realistic federal formula and worked hard to realize it.
					
					 But the south Korean authorities are getting hell-bent on the moves against reunification.
					
					 The north and the south agreed to settle the issue of reunifying the country by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation in the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration but the present south Korean authorities are not abandoning their ambition for "unification through absorption".

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de vuelo para inspeccion del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de vuelo para inspeccion del EPC
Pyongyang, 30 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio el entrenamiento de vuelo para la inspeccion de los pilotos de las unidades 1017, 447 y 458 de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC.
					El entrenamiento tuvo lugar en el orden de despegue y aterrizaje en la autopista, deteccion de blancos aereos y habilidades especiales.
					
					Los aviadores demostraron sin reservas al Comandante Supremo su alto pilotaje adiestrado en los dias cotidianos.
					
					Tras ver el entrenamiento, el Mariscal dijo que los pilotos manejan muy bien los aviones y ellos son sus companeros de armas tan valiosos que fueron formados por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il. Continuo que esos aviadores fidedignos, que defienden el cielo del pais, son los mas fuertes en la idea y la conviccion.
					
					Seguidamente, subio al compartimiento de piloto del caza no. 550 movilizado en el entrenamiento y converso con el jefe de compania de vuelo, piloto del caza, cerciorandose de las especificaciones tecnicas de la aeronave.
					
					Mostrandose complacido una vez mas por la exitosa marcha de los ejercicios, expreso agradecimiento a las unidades 1017, 447 y 458 en nombre del Comandante Supremo del EPC.
					
					Dio la orden del Comandante Supremo de ascender el grado militar de los jefes de batallon, Kim Hyon Ung, Kang Kyong Chol, Kim Chang Ho y Sin Thae Sop quienes mostraron alto pilotaje.
					
					Kim Jong Un consulto con los comandantes de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC las medidas para hacer frente a la guerra moderna y presento nuevas tareas y los remedios para resolver los problemas importantes surgidos en perfeccionar la combatividad de las fuerzas aereas.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el secretario del CC del PTC, Choe Ryong Hae, el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, O Il Jong y Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un publica obra sobre proteccion de patrimonios nacionales
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un publica obra sobre proteccion de patrimonios nacionales
Pyongyang, 30 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un publico el dia 24 la obra "La conservacion del patrimonio nacional es una labor patriotica destinada a hacer valer la historia y la tradicion de nuestra nacion". 
					En su trabajo el Mariscal senalo que el mausoleo de Tangun, reconstruido con elegancia por el noble patriotismo y la sabia orientacion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, comprueba que desde la alborada de la civilizacion de la humanidad la nacion coreana vivio como nacion homogenea con la misma sangre, y sirve de sagrado lugar de la nacion para educar a toda la nacion con el espiritu patriotico, lo cual es un gran jubilo de la nacion coreana y victoria de la autoctona politica en materia de proteccion de patrimonios nacionales. 
					
					El Mariscal recordo que durante todo el periodo de la direccion sobre la revolucion, los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il prestaron profunda atencion a la proteccion de patrimonios nacionales para hacer alarde a todo el mundo de la larga historia y la radiante cultura de la nacion coreana. 
					
					Al corregir los problemas historicos tergiversados y complicados por los chovinistas y servidores a grandes potencias, el Presidente Kim Il Sung confirmo que Corea es uno de los origenes de la cultura de la humanidad y determino correctamente la historia nacional iniciada desde la Corea de Tangun. 
					
					Y presento la politica de continuar y desarrollar los patrimonios nacionales en la posicion independiente e hizo descubrir nuevos patrimonios culturales y reconstruir en estado original las reliquias historicas destruidas por los invasores extranjeros, de modo que los patrimonios culturales creados por los antecesores coreanos se heredaran como tesoros nacionales. 
					
					En acato al proposito del Presidente, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il evaluo y aclaro correctamente los asuntos de suma importancia en definir bien la historia de Corea. 
					
					El Mariscal destaco en su obra que el Partido del Trabajo de Corea mantiene la firme voluntad de convertir la patria en el pais civilizado de talla mundial y la potencia prospera con larga historia y brillante cultura, apoyando el noble proposito de los Generalisimos. 
					
					Apunto que la proteccion de patrimonios culturales es una labor patriotica para heredar y desarrollar los patrimonios mentales y fisicos adquiridos por los antecesores y mantener y glorificar la historia y la tradicion de la nacion. 
					
					Enfatizo la necesidad de materializar cabalmente las ideas y teorias en materia de la proteccion de patrimonios nacionales, aclaradas por los Generalisimos, tomandolas por guia directriz. 
					
					La posicion del Juche, la historica y la cientifica constituyen los principios fundamentales a ser mantenidos invariablemente en proteger, heredar y desarrollar los patrimonios culturales nacionales, resalto e indico las tareas para el particular: 
					
					Hay que conservar y cuidar en status quo las reliquias y vestigios historicos conforme a las caracteristicas de la sociedad de aquel entonces y el periodo historico. 
					
					Se debe apreciar las creaciones de gran valor y las costumbres nacionales que reflejan la inteligencia y talento de la nacion y se heredan generacion tras generacion y desarrollarlas de acuerdo con las demandas de la epoca. 
					
					Es necesario hacer bien la proteccion y el cuidado sobre los lugares famosos y los  monumentos naturales. 
					
					Hay que apreciar hasta un arbol, una hierba y una piedra que dan destaque al paisaje hermoso de los lugares famosos y proteger las aves y animales salvajes en los alrededores de lugares famosos. 
					
					Es preciso acondicionar bien el museo de la historia y otras bases de educacion historica conforme al sentimiento cultural del pueblo y la tendencia de la epoca y fortalecer la educacion a traves de ellos. 
					
					Es imprescindible desplegar la proteccion de patrimonios nacionales como una labor de todo el pais y todo el pueblo y elevar su nivel cientifico acorde a las demandas de la realidad en desarrollo. 
					
					El Mariscal insistio en divulgar y evaluar las conductas patrioticas de los habitantes y los compatriotas en ultramar que donan las valiosas reliquias historicas. 
					
					Y subrayo la necesidad de activar el intercambio con las organizaciones internacionales  y otros paises. 
					
					Por ultimo, el Mariscal exhorto a materializar cabalmente la politica del partido en materia de proteccion de patrimonios nacionales a fin de defender las proezas de los Generalisimos y glorificar la historia y la tradicion de la nacion coreana.

articles.title: MINREX denuncia intento de aprobar "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC
articles.content:
MINREX denuncia intento de aprobar "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 30 de octubre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 30 una declaracion con respecto a que coincidiendo en tiempo con el inicio del enfrentamiento total de Estados Unidos contra la RPDC, se torna mas grave en este ano la campana de las fuerzas hostiles para aprobar la "resolucion de DDHH" contra la RPDC. 
					A fin de fomentar constantemente el disfrute de derechos humanos de las masas populares, hemos realizado sinceros esfuerzos por promover el dialogo y la cooperacion internacionales en el dominio de DDHH, comienza la nota y continua:
					
					Recientemente, hemos dado el gesto indulgente de considerar positivamente el problema de sostener el dialogo de DDHH, que se habia congelado debido a la actitud unilateral de la Union Europea (UE), y la visita del "relator especial" de la ONU sobre la situacion de DDHH de la RPDC. Ademas, hemos consentido la visita a nuestro pais del representante plenipotenciario de la UE encargado de DDHH y expresamos a la oficina de alto comisionado de la ONU para los derechos humanos la voluntad de aceptar la cooperacion tecnica. 
					
					Sin embargo, no se realizan el dialogo y la cooperacion internacionales en esa esfera debido a la politica hostil de EE.UU. que pretende manchar la imagen de la RPDC dando destaque al "problema de DDHH" y derrocar su regimen. 
					
					Por conducto de su secretario de Estado, EE.UU. hizo convocar en la ONU la llamada "reunion de alto nivel sobre la situacion de DDHH del Norte de Corea" e impidio la participacion en ella de la RPDC por el temor a la revelacion del secreto de ese sucio debate politico. Ese pais orquesto tambien la campana de criticas a la RPDC involucrando a las basuras humanas conocidas como "fugitivos norcoreanos" que cometieron imperdonables crimenes y huyeron abandonados por sus paisanos y parientes. 
					
					EE.UU. hace vista gorda de los sinceros esfuerzos de la RPDC y esta desesperado por mantener el ambiente de presion internacional contra ella presentando pretextos injustos, porque tiene miedo a que el dialogo y la cooperacion de la RPDC con la sociedad internacional en el tema de DDHH fomenten mas el disfrute de DDHH del pueblo coreano y eleven mas el prestigio exterior de ella. 
					
					Si la Union Europea aprueba forzadamente el "proyecto de resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC mas cruel que antes, sumandose al malsano intento de EE.UU., perdera para siempre la oportunidad de tratarse con la RPDC en ese tema y se produciran consecuencias imprevisibles.  
					
					Nos esforzaremos en todo lo posible por defender el regimen socialista al estilo coreano, donde se da primacia a las masas populares, y por consolidarlo y desarrollarlo aun mas.

articles.title: CRPP condena la posposicion indefinida de traspaso del mando de operaciones
articles.content:
CRPP condena la posposicion indefinida de traspaso del mando de operaciones
Pyongyang, 30 de octubre (ACNC) -- En la 46a reunion consultiva anual de seguridad, sesionada hace poco en Washington, Estados Unidos y la banda titere surcoreana acordaron aplazar el traspaso del mando de operaciones en el tiempo de guerra, que el primero debe entregar a la segunda hasta el ano 2015, hasta cuando se preparen el ambiente de seguridad en la region de la Peninsula Coreana y la capacidad militar principal del ejercito titere surcoreano.
					Asimismo, quedaron en mantener en Seul y la zona al norte del rio Han la "comandancia de las fuerzas aliadas EE.UU.-Sur de Corea" y la brigada de fuego no.210 de las fuerzas norteamericanas, que segun el acuerdo anterior, deben ser trasladados a Phyongthaek de la provincia de Kyonggi, hasta que sea transferido el mando de operaciones en el tiempo de guerra, y en consultar constantemente el "proyecto de compartimiento de informaciones militares" EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea.
					
					En su informacion no. 1077 publicada el dia 29, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria critico esos debates entre el amo gringo y su lacayo surcoreano.
					
					La banda surcoreana tiene la siniestra intencion de mantener su vida al fortalecer la confabulacion agresiva con EE.UU. y de recrudecer la campana conflictiva contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					Por su parte, EE.UU. persigue el objetivo criminal de realizar su politica agresiva contra la RPDC y la estrategia de dominar Asia-Pacifico tomando las riendas de los titeres surcoreanos y usando el suelo surcoreano como trampolin militar.
					
					La posposicion indefinida del mando de operaciones en el tiempo de guerra es una verguenza nacional e imperdonable crimen antinacional que monta en colera a todos los coreanos.
					
					La renuncia perpetua de la soberania militar significa abandonar para siempre la soberania politica y economica.
					
					Los habitantes surcoreanos no podran liberarse nunca de las afrentas de apatridas subyugados a EE.UU. no solo en lo politico y economico sino tambien en lo militar.
					
					En este mundo no hay otros vendepatrias tan imbeciles como los titeres surcoreanos que renuncian la soberania militar adulando a las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					Los que firmaron el acuerdo de aplazamiento indefinido seran condenados de generacion en generacion como traidores identicos a Ri Wan Yong y Syngman Rhee.
					
					A pesar de estar privados de la autoridad militar, lo fundamental de la soberania estatal, los titeres surcoreanos suelen decir del "estatus del Estado" haciendose "pais avanzado".
					
					Nosotros, junto con toda la nacion, no perdonaremos jamas el aplazamiento indefinido y le haremos frente rotundo.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam llego a Kampala
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam llego a Kampala
Kampala, 29 de octubre (Corresponsal de ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, arribo el dia 29 a Kampala, capital de la Republica de Uganda para realizar una visita oficial y de amistad a este pais africano.
					Le acompanaron el ministro de Salud Publica, Kang Ha Guk, el vicecanciller, Kung Sok Ung, el viceministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, So Kil Bok, y otros funcionarios.
					
					Con anterioridad, Kim y su comitiva partieron de la Republica del Congo.

articles.title: Parte de Pyongyang delegacion gubernamental de Japon
articles.content:
Parte de Pyongyang delegacion gubernamental de Japon
Pyongyang, 30 de octubre (ACNC) -- Regreso el dia 30 por via aerea la delegacion gubernamental de Japon encabezada por el director de Asia y Oceania del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores, Junichi Ihara.
					Durante la estancia en Corea de la delegacion japonesa, el presidente del "Comite de Investigacion Especial", So Tae Ha, consejero de seguridad del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y viceministro de Seguridad Estatal, informo a la parte japonesa el estado de investigacion realizada hasta ahora sobre todos los japoneses residentes en el territorio jurisdiccional de la RPDC para la implementacion del acuerdo intergubernamental Corea-Japon de Estocolmo.
					
					Los jefes de las secciones del "Comite de Investigacion Especial" sostuvieron conversaciones y entrevistas con la parte japonesa.

articles.title: Inauguradas estaciones ferroviarias de comuna de Ryongwon y de Paesanjom
articles.content:
Inauguradas estaciones ferroviarias de comuna de Ryongwon y de Paesanjom
Pyongyang, 30 de octubre (ACNC) -- Termino la obra de reconstruccion de la estacion ferroviaria de la comuna de Ryongwon y la de Paesanjom que usaran los vacacionistas de la Casa de Reposo de Cientificos Yonphung y otros habitantes.
					Las estaciones ferroviarias se acondicionaron magnificamente conforme al gusto de la epoca contemporanea armonizandose con el ambiente periferico de la casa de reposo y el reparto de viviendas de cientificos Wisong.
					
					Tuvieron lugar el dia 30 sendas ceremonias inaugurales en las respectivas estaciones ferroviarias con la participacion de los funcionarios de rama de transporte ferroviario, constructores y empleados.
